content: Kathy Smith is here today for follow-up. She states she is doing okay overall but still experiences some swelling and pain. She is not satisfied with her hand therapy and wishes to return to Jack.
title: History of Present Illness

content: Incisions well healed. Minimal scar. Some continued tenderness to palpation at the A1 pulley incision. No tendon desquamation at the dorsal hand. Full fist. Moderate soft tissue swelling in the left space especially. Excellent range of motion overall. Some continued pain with motion.
title: Musculoskeletal

content: Continue therapy. Return to Jack for hand therapy. Return to clinic in 6 weeks.
title: Plan
